tripleplay.ui.bgs
Class Scale9Background.Axis3

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.ui.bgs.Scale9Background.Axis3
Enclosing class:
Scale9Background
public static class Scale9Background.Axis3
extends Object

A horizontal or vertical axis, broken up into 3 chunks.

Constructor Summary
Scale9Background.Axis3(float length)
          Creates a new axis equally splitting the given length.
Scale9Background.Axis3(float length, Scale9Background.Axis3 src)
          Creates a new axis with the given total length and 0th and 2nd lengths copied from a source axis.
 
Method Summary
 float coord(int idx)
          Returns the coordinate of the given chunk, 0 - 2.
 Scale9Background.Axis3 resize(int idx, float size)
          Sets the size of the given chunk, shifting neighbors.
 Scale9Background.Axis3 set(int idx, float coord, float size)
          Sets the size and location of the given chunk, 0 - 2.
 float size(int idx)
          Returns the size of the given chunk, 0 - 2.
